description: Enterprise techniques used by PS1, ATT&CK software S0613 (v1.2)
name: PS1 (S0613)

techniques.comment: [PS1](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0613) can utilize a PowerShell loader.(Citation: BlackBerry CostaRicto November 2020)
[PS1](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0613) can use an XOR key to decrypt a PowerShell loader and payload binary.(Citation: BlackBerry CostaRicto November 2020)
[CostaBricks](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0614) can download additional payloads onto a compromised host.(Citation: BlackBerry CostaRicto November 2020)
[PS1](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0613) is distributed as a set of encrypted files and scripts.(Citation: BlackBerry CostaRicto November 2020)
[PS1](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0613) can inject its payload DLL Into memory.(Citation: BlackBerry CostaRicto November 2020)
